definition: surname Cheng/Cheng (c. 2000 BC), third of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God
to bear/to carry/to hold/to continue/to undertake/to take charge/owing to/due to/to receive
to cover/to wrap/to hold/to include/to take charge of/to contract (to or for)/package/wrapper/container/bag/to hold or embrace/bundle/packet/CL:個|个[ge4],隻|只[zhi1]

sentences.english: The essence of a contract and responsibility system is to determine a contractor by selecting an operating scheme.
sentences.chinese: 承包制的本質是通過選擇承包經營方案確定承包人。

sentences.english: I’m an independent contractor. I do jobs all over Portland.
sentences.chinese: 我是個獨立承包人，在整個波特蘭地區幹活。

sentences.english: Information for this paper was provided by the contractor and manufacturer members of CSDA.
sentences.chinese: 本文所提供的資料是承包人和製造商成員美洲可持續。

sentences.english: Organize for the Contractor and the Designer to jointly examine the Drawings and deliver the design.
sentences.chinese: 組織承包人與設計單位進行圖紙會審和設計交底。

sentences.english: We do need to find office space and equipment for each contractor.
sentences.chinese: 我們需要爲每個承包人找到辦公空間和設備。

definition: borrower/leaser/the hiring side of a contract
second party (law)/see also 甲方[jia3 fang1]
